text: Ali Asghar Khodadoust (27 October 1935http://www.tourismonline.co/4747/هشتادمین-زادروز-دکتر-خدادوست.html - 10 March 2018) was an Iranian eye surgeon. He was born in Shiraz, Iran. He specialized in corneal transplantation. His reputation was the result of in his many studies on corneal diseases and transplantation biology. Khodadoust died on 10 March 2018 in New York City of coronary artery disease at the age of 82.Ali Asghar Khodadoust, Iranian legend of ophthalmology, passes away at 82 ==References== Category:1935 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Deaths from coronary artery disease Category:Iranian physicians Category:People from Shiraz Category:Surgeons
title: Ali Asghar Khodadoust
